description:
Preparations for the cultural festival have begun as class 1-3 votes to do a "genderbent play" where the boys play girls and the girls play boys.  After some encouragement from Yoshino, Shuichi begins writing a script, but Saori also wrote a script of her own, so Mr. Saisho, their teacher, tells them to work on the script together.  Meanwhile, Yoshino was told by the basketball coach to wear a bra, which left her feeling confused about how her body was changing.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Romeo and Juliet: Juliet and Romeo
Romeo to Juliet: Juliet and Romeo
ロミオとジュリエット ~Juliet and Romeo~
